author: cnbc.com
title: Physical Rehabilitation Network Acquires Clinic in Carrollton, Texas
text:
CARROLLTON, Texas, Feb. 7, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Physical Rehabilitation Network (PRN) recently acquired Elevate Physical Therapy in Carrollton, Texas. This single facility joins the Vista Rehab Partners brand marking their 18 th outpatient rehabilitation clinic in the Dallas-Fort Worth Metroplex. Elevate Physical Therapy will continue to operate at 1012 W. Hebron Pkwy, Suite 124, Carrollton, Texas, and be directed by Nisha Matthews, PT, DPT, CHT.
Ms. Matthews received her Master's Degree in Manipulative Musculoskeletal Physiotherapy in Melbourne, Australia, and went on to obtain her Doctorate in Physical Therapy from Stony Brook University in New York. She is also trained in McKenzie-, Maitland- and Mulligan-based therapy techniques and has over 12 years of experience practicing in Canada, New York and Texas. Her skills as a certified hand therapist and a board-certified orthopedic specialist allow her to treat a wide variety of patients in the Carrollton area. She is also certified in dry needling and vestibular-certified by the American Institute of Balance.
"Nisha and the team at Elevate Physical Therapy put customer service and patient care first, aligning with the core values of Vista Rehab Partners," stated Craig Rettke, PT, MBA, regional VP for PRN. "She is a wonderful addition to our family of clinics and we look forward to her continued leadership and growth in the Carrollton community."
The Carrollton facility features a variety of physical therapy and hand therapy services including orthopedic rehabilitation, injury prevention programs, balance and vestibular training and workers' compensation services. They also offer additional specialized programs such as Smart Runner Programs, Fall Prevention Programs, Core Stabilization Programs, Health Pregnancy Programs and Moving with Arthritis Programs.
Bruce McDaniel, CEO of PRN, commented, "We are excited to have Nisha join our PRN family. Her high standards and passion for providing excellent care to patients in the Carrollton community are the qualities that we embrace and nurture throughout our organization."
For additional information on locations and services offered in Texas, visit VistaRehab.com .
About Physical Rehabilitation Network
Physical Rehabilitation Network LLC (PRN) is a privately held physical therapy organization based in Carlsbad, California. PRN is prominently recognized as the leading therapist-friendly rehab organization in the western part of the United States through its partnership model with premier physical and occupational therapists. The company currently operates over 100 locations providing local autonomy and branding to its therapist partners while streamlining all traditional overhead activities of running a practice.
PRN is actively seeking high-quality, entrepreneurially driven physical and occupational therapists interested in partnering with PRN as the company expands its footprint providing opportunities for therapists to own their own clinic. For more information on our model, our locations or partnership opportunities, visit PRNpt.com or contact Michael Rice at 312.560.6020 / mrice@prnpt.com . You can also follow us @PRNPhysicalTherapy on Facebook , @PRN_therapy on Twitter or on LinkedIn .
